The_urban.text1: Situated in Siem Reap, less than 1 km from King's Road Angkor, The Urban features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.
The_urban.text2: At the hotel, all rooms have a desk. The rooms include a safety deposit box, while some rooms have a balcony and others also feature city views. At The Urban each room is fitted with bed linen and towels.
The_urban.text3: A continental, American or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Cambodian and French cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested.
The_urban.text4: The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at The Urban.
The_urban.text5: Popular points of interest near the hotel include Artisans D'Angkor, Preah Ang Chek Preah Ang Chom and Royal Residence.
The_urban.text6: Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.9 for a two-person trip.

Waka_Villa_Private_Resort.text1: Located in Siem Reap, 1.8 km from King's Road Angkor, WAKA VILLA Private Resort & Spa - Adults Only provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar.
Waka_Villa_Private_Resort.text2: The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a microwave, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. All rooms are fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge. At WAKA VILLA Private Resort & Spa - Adults Only each room is fitted with bed linen and towels.
Waka_Villa_Private_Resort.text3: Breakfast is available daily, and includes à la carte, continental and American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Cambodian and French cuisine. Vegetarian and dairy-free options can also be requested.
Waka_Villa_Private_Resort.text4: Angkor Wat is 7.8 km from WAKA VILLA Private Resort & Spa - Adults Only, while Artisans D'Angkor is 2.4 km away.
Waka_Villa_Private_Resort.text5: Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.4 for a two-person trip.

Tara_Angkor_Hotel.text1: Located just 500 metres from Angkor National Museum, Tara Angkor Hotel offers accommodations in Siem Reap. It features an outdoor swimming pool and guests can enjoy meals from 4 dining options. It offers free WiFi throughout the property.
Tara_Angkor_Hotel.text2: It is 2.3 km to the vibrant Pub Street and Old Market. Angkor Wat is 5.4 km away. Tara Angkor Hotel is 50 km from Siem Reap International Airport.
Tara_Angkor_Hotel.text3: Tara Angkor’s rooms feature wooden flooring and garden or city views. Each room has cable TV, a safety deposit box, and tea/coffee making facilities. The private bathroom provides bath amenities, bathrobes and slippers.
Tara_Angkor_Hotel.text4: Guests can approach the 24-hour front desk for currency exchange, tour arrangements, ticketing and concierge services. Alternatively, guests can exercise in the fitness centre or relax in the sauna.
Tara_Angkor_Hotel.text5: Buffet breakfast is served at Tong Tara Restaurant, which also offers all-day international dining. Frangipani Restaurant features a European and Asian menu. Cocktails can be enjoyed at Lily Lounge or the pool bar.
Tara_Angkor_Hotel.text6: Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.5 for a two-person trip.

Pandora_Suite.title: Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at Pandora Suite D'Angkor
Pandora_Suite.text1: Located in Siem Reap, 3.4 km from King's Road Angkor, Pandora Suite D'Angkor provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. The accommodation offers a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests.
Pandora_Suite.text2: The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. Every room includes a kettle, while certain rooms include a patio and others also offer city views. At Pandora Suite D'Angkor each room comes with bed linen and towels.
Pandora_Suite.text3: The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 5-star hotel.
Pandora_Suite.text4: Angkor Wat is 3.5 km from the accommodation, while Wat Thmei is 500 metres away.
Pandora_Suite.text5: Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.1 for a two-person trip.
